<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Limited">[Victory Cry](/Spells.aspx?ID=1176)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Sonic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=147" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 143</row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Reaction" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

**Trigger** An ally within range critically succeeds at a melee Strike

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** the triggering ally
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Your true might comes from your bonds with your allies, and you glory in their achievements. The weapon used to make the Strike deals an additional 1d6 sonic damage (not doubled due to the critical hit), and the ally can immediately attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) the creature struck, even if the ally's hands are full. Your ally can use its item bonus to the triggering attack roll on the [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check, if any, and it gains a +1 status bonus to the Athletics check if the triggering Strike was with a weapon that has the [trip](/Actions.aspx?ID=40) trait or an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack that has the trip trait.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The sonic damage increases by 1d6.
name: Victory Cry
